relevant_patterns.description: Applying microservices architecture can improve scalability and maintainability of the e-commerce platform.
Ensure GDPR compliance by implementing data protection by design and default, and providing users with clear and transparent data processing information.
Implement SSL/TLS encryption to ensure secure data transmission between the user's browser and the e-commerce platform.

suggestions.suggestion: Implement a search suggestion feature to improve user search experience and reduce bounce rate.
suggestions.rationale: Research shows that search suggestion features can improve user engagement and conversion rates.

suggestions.suggestion: Implement a personalized product recommendation engine to increase average order value and customer satisfaction.
suggestions.rationale: Research indicates that personalized product recommendations can lead to increased sales and customer loyalty.

compliance_notes: Ensure compliance with PCI-DSS standards for secure payment processing.
Implement data retention and deletion policies to comply with GDPR regulations.
integration_recommendations: Integrate with third-party payment gateways to expand payment options and improve user experience.
Integrate with social media platforms to enable social login and improve user engagement.
